title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: New Community Challenge
content:
After watching the GTA Online community decimate the lurching zombie hordes in last month’s North Yankton Nightmare Community Challenge, we’re eager to see if you can topple the latest trial — collectively stealing GTA$20 TRILLION by completing select Heist Finales in The Heist Challenge.

Successfully smashing this target by December 4 will unlock a vault full of rewards for participants, and a few brand-new surprises arriving with the new GTA Online update in December.
